text: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: 89. So turn away from them (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه و سلم), and say: Salâm (peace)! But they will come to know.[3]
footnotes: (V.43:89) The provision of this Verse was abrogated by the revelation of the Verse of fighting them (V.9.5).
